co.cask.cdap.etl.api.batch

Interface BatchSourceContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BatchContext, DatasetContext, LookupProvider, StageContext, TransformContext

    @Beta
public interface BatchSourceContext
extends BatchContext
    Context of a Batch Source.

      • setInput

        @Deprecated
void setInput(StreamBatchReadable stream)
        Deprecated. Deprecated since 3.4.0. Use setInput(Input) instead
        Overrides the input configuration of this Batch job to use the specific stream.
        Parameters:
        stream - the input stream.

      • setInput

        @Deprecated
void setInput(String datasetName)
        Deprecated. Deprecated since 3.4.0. Use setInput(Input) instead
        Overrides the input configuration of this Batch job to use the specified dataset by its name.
        Parameters:
        datasetName - the name of the input dataset.

      • setInput

        @Deprecated
void setInput(String datasetName,
                       Map<String,String> arguments)
        Deprecated. Deprecated since 3.4.0. Use setInput(Input) instead
        Overrides the input configuration of this Batch job to use the specified dataset by its name and arguments.
        Parameters:
        datasetName - the the name of the input dataset
        arguments - the arguments to use when instantiating the dataset

      • setInput

        @Deprecated
void setInput(String datasetName,
                       List<Split> splits)
        Deprecated. Deprecated since 3.4.0. Use setInput(Input) instead
        Overrides the input configuration of this Batch job to use the specified dataset by its name and data selection splits.
        Parameters:
        datasetName - the name of the input dataset
        splits - the data selection splits

      • setInput

        @Deprecated
void setInput(String datasetName,
                       Map<String,String> arguments,
                       List<Split> splits)
        Deprecated. Deprecated since 3.4.0. Use setInput(Input) instead
        Overrides the input configuration of this Batch job to use the specified dataset by its name and arguments with the given data selection splits.
        Parameters:
        datasetName - the name of the input dataset
        arguments - the arguments to use when instantiating the dataset
        splits - the data selection splits

      • setInput

        @Deprecated
void setInput(InputFormatProvider inputFormatProvider)
        Deprecated. Deprecated since 3.4.0. Use setInput(Input) instead
        Overrides the input configuration of this Batch job to the one provided by the given InputFormatProvider.
        Parameters:
        inputFormatProvider - provider for InputFormat and configurations to be used

      • setInput

        void setInput(Input input)
        Overrides the input configuration of this Batch job to the specified Input.
        Parameters:
        input - the input to be used
